content.text:
[@polylith](@0nakXtVIodBfdHwRQLVb64p54jTWS+DFHRqg58ky4CI=.ed25519)

Sweet, I've merged your code and published it as ssb-markdown@4.1.0. This won't be available in the client until a new release, but I'm running a development version of Patchwork where I can show off a screenshot of my above message after `typographer` was enabled:

![screenshot of my above message with a list of symbols with the typographer option enabled](&B1ZRt3XKbaE2eYnPPHMtAvlRChRxbb7OatE+8G/Cc0A=.sha256)

Thanks for the contribution!

mentions.name: screenshot of my above message with a list of symbols with the typographer option enabled
